title: Error 003 ( Help :'( )
body: i'm having a problem with league... When i open LoL this happens: http://prntscr.com/hdgjo8

replies.body: Those 003 errors mean your network was having problems getting a solid signal with the patching servers. We were having some issues this morning, but it does look like most players have been able to get patched and back in the game by now. If you're still having problems patching, try updating your port forwarding settings and DNS server settings with the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
Thank you for help, Broporo but the error got solved hour later after posting this. :)
